atd.pillage
Interface Distribution

All Known Implementing Classes:
HistogramDistribution
public interface Distribution

Metrics are represented at a statistical distribution.

Method Summary
 Distribution delta(Distribution dist)
          Create a new distribution by subtracting another distribution from this one.
 long getCount()
          get the number of metrics collected
 long getMaximum()
          get the maximum value metric collected
 double getMean()
          get the mean value for the metrics collected
 long getMinimum()
          get the minimum value metric collected
 long getSum()
          get the sum of all the metric values
 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Number> toMap()
          return the distribution as a map of statistics comprising this metric.

delta

Distribution delta(Distribution dist)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Create a new distribution by subtracting another distribution from this one. This is useful for creating deltas. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the Distributions are incompatible types.

Parameters:
dist -
Returns:
Distribution
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
